actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Agriculture and Forestry, S. Rept. 93-86.
Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the federal meat inspection act, as amended and the poultry products inspection act, as amended, so as to increase from 50 to 60 percent the amount that may be paid as the federal governments share of the costs of any cooperative meat or poultry inspection program carried out by any state.

summary.text: Increases from 50 to 80 percent the amount that may be paid as the Federal Government's share of the costs of any cooperative meat or poultry inspection program carried out by any State under the Federal Meat Inspection Act or the Poultry Products Inspection Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the federal meat inspection act, as amended and the poultry products inspection act, as amended, so as to increase from 50 to 60 percent the amount that may be paid as the federal governments share of the costs of any cooperative meat or poultry inspection program carried out by any state.
